questions.question_text: The PRIMARY reason to implement a formalized risk taxonomy is to:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
By clearly defining risk categories, roles, and responsibilities, risk practitioners can more effectively identify and assess risks without bias or personal interpretation, leading to more consistent and accurate decisions

Selected Answer: A

questions.question_text: After the announcement of a new IT regulatory requirement, it is MOST important for a risk practitioner to:
Which of the following has the GREATEST impact on ensuring the alignment of the risk profile with business objectives?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Senior management approval of risk appetite and tolerance

choices.A: Incorporation of industry best practice benchmarks and standards
choices.B: An effective enterprise-wide risk awareness program
choices.D: Stage gate reviews throughout the risk management process
choices.C: Senior management approval of risk appetite and tolerance

Selected Answer: A
